Question: The ____–McCartney songwriting partnership is regarded as one of the most influential and successful of the 20th century.
Hints: This person detailed this period in the Beatles' song "The Ballad of John and Yoko".
This person and Ono moved to New York in August 1971, and in December released "Happy Xmas (War Is Over)".
This person's most intense feelings were reserved for McCartney.
